subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The French cyclist Christophe Riblon appeared to be in disbelief as he won Stage 18 of the Tour de France on Thursday, and Christopher Froome held on to the overall lead.
snippet: The French cyclist Christophe Riblon appeared to be in disbelief as he won Stage 18 of the Tour de France on Thursday, and Christopher Froome held on to the overall lead.
